byline.contributor: Campbell Robertson reported from Montgomery, and Alan Blinder from Charleston, W.Va.
byline.original: By CAMPBELL ROBERTSON and ALAN BLINDER

abstract: Alabama State Rep Ed Henry files articles of impeachment against Gov Robert Bentley, who has admitted to making salacious comments to senior political adviser Rebekah Caldwell Mason, who has since resigned; resolution filed by Henry details additional accusations against Bentley.
lead_paragraph: State Representative Ed Henry said he was filing articles of impeachment against Gov. Robert Bentley, who has rebuffed calls to resign.

headline.main: Lawmaker Takes First Step in an Effort to Impeach Alabama’s Governor
headline.print_headline: Lawmaker Takes First Step in an Effort to Impeach Alabama’s Governor

snippet: State Representative Ed Henry said he was filing articles of impeachment against Gov. Robert Bentley, who has rebuffed calls to resign.
